biocontainers.name: haploclique
biocontainers.summary: Viral quasispecies assembly via maximal clique finding. A method to reconstruct viral haplotypes and detect large insertions and deletions from NGS data.

biotools.summary: Computational approach to reconstruct the structure of a viral quasispecies from next-generation sequencing data as obtained from bulk sequencing of mixed virus samples.

bioschemas.name: HaploClique
bioschemas.summary: Computational approach to reconstruct the structure of a viral quasispecies from next-generation sequencing data as obtained from bulk sequencing of mixed virus samples.
